activities.name: Cherry Blossom Walk in The Meadows
activities.description: Stroll beneath avenues of cherry trees as locals celebrate the arrival of spring.
activities.seasonal_notes: Peak bloom typically mid-April; picnics and frisbee games common on sunny days.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early on weekends and bring a blanket for lounging on the grass.

activities.name: Royal Botanic Garden Glasshouses
activities.description: Explore temperate and tropical plant collections sheltered from spring showers.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring lectures and guided tours highlight rare Scottish alpine species.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided walks online; members enjoy free glasshouse entry.

activities.name: Arthur's Seat Sunrise Hike
activities.description: Climb the volcanic summit for pastel dawn light over the city and coast.
activities.seasonal_notes: Paths can be muddy-wear sturdy footwear and bring windproof layers.
activities.booking_tips: Check sunrise times; guided hikes available via local operators.

activities.name: Edinburgh Science Festival
activities.description: Hands-on experiments, talks, and evening events across museums and venues.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held over the Easter holidays with programming for all ages.
activities.booking_tips: Popular workshops sell out-book tickets two weeks in advance.

activities.name: Portobello Sea Kayaking
activities.description: Paddle along the Firth of Forth with views of Bass Rock and Inchkeith Island.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring seas remain chilly; wetsuits provided by operators.
activities.booking_tips: Choose calm weather days and check tidal conditions.

activities.name: Edinburgh Festival Fringe
activities.description: Over 3,000 shows spanning comedy, theatre, circus, and spoken word across pop-up venues.
activities.seasonal_notes: August sees streets lined with performers and late-night shows until dawn.
activities.booking_tips: Use the Fringe app for last-minute deals; book top shows months ahead.

activities.name: Royal Edinburgh Military Tattoo
activities.description: Massed pipe bands and fireworks atop the castle esplanade under the night sky.
activities.seasonal_notes: Rain or shine performances-pack waterproofs and a cushion.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets release in December and sell quickly-consider midweek shows for availability.

activities.name: Leith Waterfront Dining
activities.description: Enjoy alfresco seafood and cocktails along the Shore as sunsets linger.
activities.seasonal_notes: Outdoor terraces open May-September; evenings can be breezy.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve patio tables; bring a light layer for cooler nights.

activities.name: Portobello Beach Day
activities.description: Swim, paddleboard, or simply unwind on Edinburgh's sandy beach.
activities.seasonal_notes: Water remains cool-wetsuits recommended for longer swims.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early on warm weekends; rent boards from beachfront kiosks.

activities.name: Roof Terrace Cinema
activities.description: Catch films under the stars atop city rooftops with deckchairs and blankets.
activities.seasonal_notes: Pop-up programmes run June-August with classic and cult screenings.
activities.booking_tips: Bring layers; some venues allow BYO snacks.

activities.name: Calton Hill Sunset
activities.description: Watch the city glow beneath autumn skies framed by neo-classical monuments.
activities.seasonal_notes: Golden hour arrives earlier; pack a hot drink for breezy evenings.
activities.booking_tips: Head up 30 minutes before sunset to secure a spot.

activities.name: Bonfire Night Celebrations
activities.description: Fireworks and torchlight displays mark Guy Fawkes Night on 5 November.
activities.seasonal_notes: Major displays on Calton Hill and Meadowbank Stadium.
activities.booking_tips: Some events require pre-registration-check council listings.

activities.name: Whisky Tasting in the Old Town
activities.description: Sample single malts and learn about regional styles at atmospheric bars.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn releases feature limited-edition bottlings.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided tastings at The Scotch Whisky Experience or The Devil's Advocate.

activities.name: Rosslyn Chapel Day Trip
activities.description: Explore ornate carvings and legend-filled chapels amid woodland foliage.
activities.seasonal_notes: Combine with walks through Roslin Glen's autumn colors.
activities.booking_tips: Pre-book timed entry slots during weekends.

activities.name: Samhuinn Fire Festival
activities.description: Modern interpretation of Celtic New Year with fire choreography on the Royal Mile.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held on 31 October with elaborate costumes and drums.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets released in early autumn; dress warmly for night-time chill.

activities.name: Edinburgh Christmas Market
activities.description: Festive stalls, rides, and mulled wine fill Princes Street Gardens.
activities.seasonal_notes: Runs mid-November to early January with ice skating and Ferris wheel.
activities.booking_tips: Book weekend ice rink slots online; visit weekday evenings for fewer crowds.

activities.name: Hogmanay Street Party
activities.description: World-famous New Year's celebration with concerts, countdown, and fireworks.
activities.seasonal_notes: Tickets include street access; expect temperature near freezing.
activities.booking_tips: Buy tickets when released in summer; arrange accommodation far in advance.

activities.name: Burns Night Supper
activities.description: Celebrate 25 January with poetry, haggis, and ceilidh dancing.
activities.seasonal_notes: Venues across the city host formal or casual suppers.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve mid-December; vegetarian haggis available on request.

activities.name: National Museum of Scotland
activities.description: Warm up indoors exploring natural history and Scottish innovation galleries.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter programming includes family workshops and late openings.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive near opening to enjoy quieter galleries.

activities.name: Ross Bandstand Ice Rink
activities.description: Seasonal outdoor rink with castle backdrop and festive lighting.
activities.seasonal_notes: Operates November-January; sessions last 45 minutes.
activities.booking_tips: Book online to secure skate hire; gloves recommended.
